text:
Green Leaf’s Bananas & Bananas Smoothies & Frozen Yogurt is offering the Common Cents smoothie specially priced at 80 cents for women and $1 for men. Wondering about the price difference? The offer honors today’s International Women’s Day and represents the current documented wage gap between men and women, which according to the World Economic Forum, will not close entirely until the year 2186. The Common Cents Smoothie, a blend of strawberries, peanut butter, honey water and non-fat vanilla frozen yogurt, is available today only.
Sugarloaf Mills, 5900 Sugarloaf Pkwy., Lawrenceville. 678-847-0253 , greenleafsbananas.com
